metadata.title: CVE-2013-2082 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Moodle through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.10, 2.3.x before 2.3.7, and 2.4.xbefore 2.4.4 does not enforce capability requirements for reading blogcomments, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information viaa crafted request.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
